name.value: FHIR Connectathon 14 - Patient - Formal Testing - FHIR Server - All Base Operations - Server Assigned Resource Id - JSON

description.value: Patient Track - Formal Testing - tests FHIR Server using the JSON format to register (create), read, update, retrieve history, version read, search and delete a Patient resource instance where the server assigns the resource id.
Patient create, read, update, delete, history-instance, version read and search-type operations
System-generated search and delete operations from conditional delete to insure the patient does not exist on the server.
Create a new patient, no extensions where the server assigns the resource id using JSON. The expected response content is the created Patient resource in JSON format.
Create patient with server assigned resource id.

Confirm that the returned format is the FHIR JSON format.

Confirm that the returned resource type is Patient. Warning only as this is optional but servers are encouraged to return the updated resource.
